projects.name: StillALive
projects.description: A personal safety and check-in application that allows users to set status updates, receive personalized push notifications, and enable DND mode. Built with React Native and Firebase.

projects.name: Kozeo
projects.description: A consumer-facing social and project-based platform that helps computer science students build strong profiles through real-life, paid projects and verified experience.

projects.name: NirogyaSaathi
projects.description: A digital healthcare companion platform focused on wellness tracking, health assistance, and remote support features for patients and caregivers.

projects.name: SatvikYoga
projects.description: A yoga and wellness application offering guided sessions, progress tracking, and personalized routines to promote a healthy and balanced lifestyle.
